title: 524 E. 17th St, 2bed/1ba, Super Clean, South Lake, Near Shops
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.

New Special Offer: $1,500 Cash Bonus At Move In!

For an Appointment to View, please contact: Maria office:
Cats Allowed (Extra deposit may be required), No Dogs
St, Super Clean 2/1, South Lake, Near Shops
$30/month cat rent, but sorry NO DOGS
Property has beautiful landscape and features
The cross streets are East 17th St. and 5th Ave.
Lake Merritt is only a few steps away from your front door.
Walk to Parkway Commercial district for Lucky's Super Market, Merritt Bakery, and many other great businesses
Walk to Laney College and California Museum
The Lakeshore/Grand shopping district is nearby also.

Walk to Lake Merritt, Farmer's Market, Grand Lake shops, restaurants, bars, coffee houses, and Grand Lake Theaters, Parkway Theater, Merritt Bakery, Saturday Farmers Market, AC Transit commuter bus route, and the beautiful parks and trails surrounding Lake Merritt
Close to Downtown and Jack London Square
Bus stops for AC Transit nearby on Lakeshore Ave
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
